alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kenedy, northeastern Hidalgo and southeastern Brooks Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1013 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rachal, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Armstrong, Encino, Rachal, Norias and Armstrong Ranch Airport. This includes the following highways... US Highway 77 between mile markers 732 and 748. US Highway 281 between mile markers 728 and 742. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
